price: Sesungguhnya, kami dan bapak-bapak kami telah diberi ancaman (dengan) ini 1018 dahulu; ini tidak lain hanyalah dongengan orang-orang dahulu kala!".
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā naḥnu waābāunā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
